text: Giovanni Giacomo Mattei was the founder of one powerful branch of the house of Mattei. He was Count Palatine of the Lateran Palace and a Conservatore of Rome, 1451. He married in 1437 to Isabella dei conti dell'Anguillara. Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing G Category:15th- century Italian people
title: Giovanni Giacomo Mattei
